com.rohanclan.cfml.parser.docitems
Class TextNode

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.parser.docitems.DocItem
      com.rohanclan.cfml.parser.docitems.TextNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class TextNode
extends DocItem

A text node within a document. This will consist of purely no text and will have no children (i.e. it will always be a leaf node).

Author:
Oliver Tupman
